name: Rolus in the Outskirts [SAGE 2022 DEMO]
description:
Rolus is a loser who lives in a town in the middle of nowhere, just on the Outskirts of a big city. He spends his days staring at the walls of his shack, shooting at ducks outside, and dumpster diving for food.

One day while looking for a burger, he finds a Mysterious Glowing Object, crashed into the dumpster...

With the dumpster destroyed, Rolus has no choice but to find another means to buy himself a Delicious Cheeseburger.

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD 

Z/SPACE: Shoot
Q/C: Shovel/ Talk
WASD/ARROWKEYS: Move
E/C: Use Crystals
SHIFT: Strafe
P: Pause

XBOX
X : Shoot
B : Shovel / Talk
Y : Use Crystals
L TRIGGER : Strafe
MENU BUTTON: Pause
